Sentencas: CO2 emission rates from commercial and residential sectors, as well as transportation, are high.
Titulo: CO2 mitigation with new energy systems

Sentencas: Applications of solar energy as a fuel-switching measure and of fuel cells for energy-efficiency improvement can reduce CO2 emissions from these sectors.
Titulo: CO2 mitigation with new energy systems

Sentencas: Photovoltaic (PV) energy systems using roof-top cells, cogeneration systems with solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), and electric vehicles with a hybrid system of SOFCs and batteries are considered and their utility in CO2 mitigation is discussed.
Titulo: CO2 mitigation with new energy systems

Sentencas: Possible reductions in CO2 emissions are estimated to be 43 million tons per year as carbon (Mt-C/y) in Japan.
Titulo: CO2 mitigation with new energy systems
